info.title: openconfig-ethernet-segments
info.description:
This module contains definitions of ethernet segements.
     The ethernet segments are used in EVPN services are
     defined for the whole device

**Module:** `openconfig-ethernet-segments`
**Paths:** 11

**📊 YANG Tree:** [View openconfig-ethernet-segments structure](https://jeremycohoe.github.io/cisco-ios-xe-openapi-swagger/yang-trees/openconfig-ethernet-segments.html)

get.description:
Top-level container for ethernet segments. An Ethernet Segment
        is referenced by a name and an ESI

put.description:
Create or replace Top-level container for ethernet segments. An Ethernet Segment
        is referenced by a name and an ESI

patch.description:
Partially modify Top-level container for ethernet segments. An Ethernet Segment
        is referenced by a name and an ESI

delete.description:
Delete Top-level container for ethernet segments. An Ethernet Segment
        is referenced by a name and an ESI

get.description: Configuration data for the Ethernet Segments.

put.description: Create or replace Configuration data for the Ethernet Segments.

patch.description: Partially modify Configuration data for the Ethernet Segments.

delete.description: Delete Configuration data for the Ethernet Segments.

get.description: Operational state data for the Ethernet Segments.

put.description: Create or replace Operational state data for the Ethernet Segments.

patch.description: Partially modify Operational state data for the Ethernet Segments.

delete.description: Delete Operational state data for the Ethernet Segments.

esi-type.description:
ESI Type is a 1-octet field (most significant octet) that
        specifies the format of the remaining 9 octets (ESI Value).

esi.description: This ESI type indicates an auto-generated ESI value.

redundancy-mode.description:
Multihoming options for load balancing of
        traffic in the Ethernet Segment.

df-election-method.description: The default Designated Forwarder Election election method

preference.description:
The preference value is only applicable
        to the preference based method

revertive.description:
The revertive value is only applicable
        to the preference method

election-wait-time.description:
The Designated Forwarder Election wait-time is only applicable
        to the preference method
